arts.ttl: Toulouse vs PSG – Referee appointed for Ligue 1 matchday 3
arts.sum: This Saturday, as part of Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (3rd) will face Toulouse (2nd) at the Stade de France (kick-off at 9:05 p.m. CET). The referee for the match has been chosen: Eric Wattelier (37 years old). He has significant experience in Ligue 1, having played 124 matches. The […]
